message: On a side note, why can't be technical books this beautiful?
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: This is not a technical book. It doesn't have an animal on its cover :D
Also, I don't like Eric Schmidt and I wouldn't read any of this books. It's all BS propaganda (propaganda maybe a strong word, but BS is accurate).

Eric Schmidt is no visionary. He's a business guy, and all this actions/books/work is for improving that business, whether it's Google or Schmidt himself.
I've read parts of his other book, and it's all vague cliches re-formatted for the 21 centurey.
Schmidt is moving from running a company to affecting change on a national and global level through setting mindsets and relationships with governments and world leaders. It's not the good kind of change. I'm very spectical of what he does.
